name: Dead hand (itch) (Stingby12)
description:
A Halloween puzzle game where you play as a zombie hand and you pull crates by pulling their handles.

I know it's not longer Halloween by the time I published the game, but I still hope you enjoy and that you had an happy Halloween.

Also great news ! The next game in the "Sokoban gone wrong" series is the next game coming !

Source code :

https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=d666587ab4e011c4dc5f5e4b2f003bb0

Controls :

Arrow keys to move
X to grab / release
Z to undo, R to restart
